page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT IN BRAMSHAW AREA
page.content: Mainly associated with the land or service industries. {ON THE LAND}Commoners with smallholdings; one agister; keepers or woodmen employed by the FC. {SERVICE INDUSTRIES }2 hotels, 1 inn, 2 garages, 1 golf course, village store -cum PO. Part time work in gardening, domestic work or in connection with horses. A few men also employed by County Council as roadmen, dustmen A school for philately gives work for some 2O persons mainly from outside the area. {WORK OUTSIDE BRAMSHAW AREA} Difficult to live in Bramshaw & work outside it without relatively well paid job because of need to have a car. Work is mainly in commerce or professions. Residents are aware of undesirability of becoming a commuter village.
